about_the_game:
The only escape is down through the center

The game board is a set of concentric rings, each inner ring lower than its outer neighbor, with a set of sloping notches cut at various intervals. Your set of marbles starts in the notches of the outermost ring. When a ring is rotated, a marble will drop through any aligned notch. Drop through the center and you leave the board. Clear all your marbles from the board and you win.

  • Play solo against different computer strategies.
  • Multi-player against others in the Steam Community.
  • Select from various game options for number of players, count of marbles, starting positions, scoring, exit constraints, ...
  • Configure the board and marble appearance.
  • Game play is based on a physics simulation of ramps and rolling balls.
This is a purposefully slow-paced, non-violent, turn-based game that gives you plenty to contemplate as you consider your next move.

The only escape is down through the center

The game board is a set of concentric rings, each inner ring lower than its outer neighbor, with a set of sloping notches cut at various intervals. Your set of marbles starts in the notches of the outermost ring. When a ring is rotated, a marble will drop through any aligned notch. Drop through the center and you leave the board. Clear all your marbles from the board and you win.

  • Multi-player against others in the Steam Community.
  • Select from various game options for number of players, count of marbles, starting positions, scoring, exit constraints, ...
  • Configure the board and marble appearance.

This is a purposefully slow-paced, non-violent, turn-based game that gives you plenty to contemplate as you consider your next move.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14.6
  • Processor: 64 bit Intel
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14.6
  • Processor: 64 bit Intel
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Nine Circles of Hell

short_description: A simple strategy game: rotate a ring, align the notches and your marbles fall towards the center. Drop all your marbles through the central hole and you win.
